com.dhemery.os

Interface OSCommandBuilder<T extends OSCommand>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of OSCommand created
    All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactoryBasedCommandBuilder

    public interface OSCommandBuilder<T extends OSCommand>
extends Builder<T>
    Builds an OSCommand to be executed by the operating system. How the builder obtains the descripton and path for the command is left to implementors.

    To build a command:

    • Call withArgument(String), withArguments(String...), and withArguments(java.util.List) any number of times to append command arguments.
    • Call withEnvironment(java.util.Map) any number of times to add a set of environment variables to the command's execution environment.

    The resulting argument list contains the accumulated arguments, in the order they were added.

    • Method Summary

      Append arguments to the command's argument list.
      OSCommandBuilder<T> withEnvironment(Map<String,String> environment)

      • withEnvironment

        OSCommandBuilder<T> withEnvironment(Map<String,String> environment)
        Merge environment variables into the builder's execution environment for the command. If the given map defines a variable that is already defined in the builder's accumulated environment, the builder's value is replaced by the one in the given map.
        Parameters:
        environment - a map containing the variables to add
        Returns:
        this command builder
